title: When do we get season rewards
body: I know season ends November 11th 12:01am. But I'd like to know when does Riot start handing out the rewards? I'm excited for the victorious skin. Is there a period of time where rewards are given out? This is my first year of LoL so I'm not really familiar with how seasons work.

replies.body: When the season ended last year, they began to distribute rewards within 12 hours of the season's closure. Read more about it [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/season-2014-ending).
